translations: v.无礼地说（cheek 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: He stopped and turned his head quickly, his poppy-cheeked face lighting up.
sentences.translation: 他停了下来，迅速地转过头去，有着深红脸颊的脸上露出喜色。

sentences.sentence: Many voters might look at David Cameron and his cabinet-filled as it is with smooth-cheeked sons of privilege-and see the Establishment on parade.
sentences.translation: 许多选民也许瞧了一眼卡梅伦和他的阁员(这些人可都是脸须刮得精亮的权贵之后)，就会认为自己已经看到公示亮相的整个体制。
